Route 130 by car or bus, but then you are also able to take the Riverline  into either the Cinnaminson station, or the Riverton Station which is very close to Cinnaminson.    The Riverline also connects in Camden at the Walter Reed Transportation Center with the PATCO High Speedline.  There are bus stations located on RT 130 using NJ Transit
The main mode of transportation is by car, however there are bus stops in Cinnaminson that are able to take you to other nearby towns and locations.

Cinnaminson has many small parks that are great for recreational purposes.  Dog walking, and running are very popular, as well as basketball and baseball.  Many of the larger parks offer baseball fields, basketball courts, tennis courts, as well as a playground for children.  Walking around town is a great thing to do, many Cinnaminson residents take pride in the appearance of their homes, and are beautifully decorated with gardens.

Cinnaminson recently opened up new shops along Rt. 130.  The Shoppes at Cinnaminson Avenue, includes a Shop Rite, Burlington Coat Factory, and is in the process of opening up other large brand name businesses.  There are many great outdoor parks located around town, each child friendly.

Neighboring towns, such as Delran and Cherry Hill offer more shopping centers, as well as a mall located in Moorestown and Cherry Hill.  Movie theaters located in Cherry Hill and Moorestown are also something to do with your leisure time.

Cinnaminson is located very close to 2 shopping malls.  

The Cherry Hill Mall

is finishing a renovation, as well as adding new stores.  

The Moorestown Mall
is a smaller mall, however there is a movie theater attached.
Cinnaminson offers both chain and locally owned restaurants.

Cinnaminson offers two bars, Whistlers and The Jug Handle Inn.  

Whistlers is located  901 Rt. 130 S., Cinnaminson, NJ 08077, (856) 786-8776
The Jug Handle is located 2398 Route 73, Cinnaminson, NJ 08077, (856) 665-8696

Many restaurants are BYOB, and there are also local restaurants that offer lounges such as Hathaways which is a diner.

There are a few motels located along RT 130, but there are also franchised hotels in neighboring towns, such as Cherry Hill, NJ.

The Sleep Inn  208 Route 130 North, Cinnaminson, NJ, (856)-829-0717

Cinnaminson Motor Lounge 1905 Route 130, Cinnaminson, NJ, (856)-829-3115 

Hallmark Motel 399 Route 130 South, Cinnaminson, NJ, 1 (856)-829-5440
The Township office is located at 1621 Riverton Road, Cinnaminson, NJ 08077.  Their telephone number is (856)-829-6000.
